text:
Do you use or support OWA? It is probably worth your time to read about
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in general and specifically ZDI-CAN-22101 –
CreateAttachmentFromURI Server-Side Request Forgery. Even if you are not an OWA
user, Piotr Bazydlo breaks down the attack sequence in a way that is simple to
understand. 
“To sum up, the following attack scenario is possible:
• The attacker authenticates to OWA.
• The attacker creates a new draft message.
• The attacker invokes CreateAttachmentFromUri, triggering the SSRF.
• The response of the SSRF gets added to the mail message as an attachment.
• The attacker downloads the attachment and retrieves the response content.” 
https://www.zerodayinitiative.com/blog/2023/11/1/unpatched-powerful-ssrf-in-exchange-owa-getting-response-through-attachments
 
Thanks, 
Job 
--
%24b52bec90%241f83c5b0%24%40ccbox.com

ZDI-CAN-22101 - CreateAttachmentFromURI Server-Side Request Forgery. 
Do you use or support OWA? It is probably worth your time to read about
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in general and specifically ZDI-CAN-22101 –
CreateAttachmentFromURI Server-Side Request Forgery. Even if you are not an OWA
user, Piotr Bazydlo breaks down the attack sequence in a way that is simple to
understand. 
“To sum up, the following attack scenario is possible:
• The attacker authenticates to OWA.
• The attacker creates a new draft message.
• The attacker invokes CreateAttachmentFromUri, triggering the SSRF.
• The response of the SSRF gets added to the mail message as an attachment.
• The attacker downloads the attachment and retrieves the response content.” 
https://www.zerodayinitiative.com/blog/2023/11/1/unpatched-powerful-ssrf-in-exchange-owa-getting-response-through-attachments
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.zerodayinitiative.com%2Fblog%2F2023%2F11%2F1%2Funpatched-powerful-ssrf-in-exchange-owa-getting-response-through-attachments&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cd809a8acc73e47ee7b2a08dbe007035f%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638350092949370009%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=mrFDy%2FvTA%2FkpbSBR1SYei%2BMyyKN2Velug1alrBJHmhU%3D&reserved=0]
